sentences.sentence: The government has lent millions of dollars to debt-ridden banks in contravention of local banking laws.
sentences.translation: 政府把数百万美元借给了债台高筑的银行，违反了地方银行业法律。

sentences.sentence: These actions are in contravention of European law.
sentences.translation: 这些行动违反了欧洲的法律。

sentences.sentence: Any attempted assignment in contravention of this Clause shall be void.
sentences.translation: 任何试图违反本条规定进行的转让均为无效。
